nodes.text: A line regiment was a formation of the Imperial Army.

A line regiment was comprised of two line battalions, an assault battalion, and a repulsorlift battalion, and a regimental headquarters. A line regiment's strength was 3,530 personnel supported by 130 repulsorcraft. Line regiments were generally deployed on planets where low level resistance was expected.
The COMPNOR Regiment was nearly identical to the line regiment's design. With the main exception been the lack five security platoons.
Line regiments could be augmented by the addition of another line battalion, an assault battalion, a repulsorlift battalion, and an artillery battalion.
